mapper.select: SELECT m.id as memberIdFk, m.memberNickname, c.commentContents, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt FROM comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON c.memberIdFk = m.id WHERE c.postIdFk = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (memberIdFk, postIdFk, commentContents) VALUES (#{memberIdFk}, #{postIdFk}, #{commentContents})
